  • Uses of Lines in org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff

    Methods in org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff that return Lines
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Lines
    Lines.FromInclToExcl​(int fromInclusive, int toExclusive)
    Creates a range of line numbers including the first line number and ending at but excluding the second line number.
    static Lines
    Lines.FromInclToIncl​(int fromInclusive, int toInclusive)
    Creates a range of line numbers including the first line number and ending at and including the second line number.
    static Lines
    Lines.Invalid()
    Creates an invalid range that does not represent a valid range of line numbers in a text file.
    static Lines
    DiffLineNumber.rangeAfterEdit​(DiffLineNumber from, DiffLineNumber to)
    Returns the range between two line numbers before the edit.
    static Lines
    DiffLineNumber.rangeBeforeEdit​(DiffLineNumber from, DiffLineNumber to)
    Returns the range between two line numbers before the edit.
    static Lines
    DiffLineNumber.rangeInDiff​(DiffLineNumber from, DiffLineNumber to)
    Returns the range between two line numbers in the diff.
    static Lines
    Lines.SingleLine​(int lineNo)
    Creates a range that covers only a single line.

  • Uses of Lines in org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree

    Methods in org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree that return Lines
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Lines
    DiffNode.getLinesAfterEdit()
    Returns the range of line numbers of this node's corresponding source code after the edit.
    Lines
    DiffNode.getLinesBeforeEdit()
    Returns the range of line numbers of this node's corresponding source code before the edit.
    Lines
    DiffNode.getLinesInDiff()
    Returns the range of line numbers of this node's corresponding source code in the text-based diff.
